metadata.title: CVE-2022-20148 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: In TBD of TBD, there is a possible use-after-free due to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege in the kernel with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-219513976References: Upstream kernel
